statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (9,-14) and (14,-8).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

solution.p: \displaystyle\frac{{-{8}-{\left(-{14}\right)}}}{{{14}-{\left({9}\right)}}}=\frac{{6}}{{5}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{6}}{{5}} (if it's not already reduced)
